title: GNU Mailman 3 and Django
summary:
GNU Mailman, the popular mailing list manager has undergone a major
redesign. One of the changes is the separation of the web user
interfaces from the core engine and the use of Django for list
management and archiving.

This talk shows how these interfaces use Mailman's internal APIs, how
they can be integrated into existing Django projects and how they can be
customized and extended.

Help us caption & translate this video!
